## type Options

Options represents structure of application options

```go
type Options struct {
    ShortDescription       string
    LongDescription        string
    HasConfiguration       bool
    ConfigurationPath      string
    ConfigurationFile      string
    ConfigurationEnvPrefix string
}
```
